text.div:
Generated Narrative: PlanDefinition

Resource PlanDefinition "IMMZ.DT.15.Cholera"

url: http://fhir.org/guides/who/smart-immunization/PlanDefinition/IMMZ.DT.15.Cholera

version: 0.1.0

name: IMMZ.DT.15.Cholera

title: IMMZ.DT.15.Cholera

status: draft

date: 2023-04-13 07:36:12+0000

publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)

description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give the Cholera vaccine to child greater than or equal to 1 year old and adults

jurisdiction: Global (Whole world) (m49.htm#001)

library: IMMZDT15

action

title: Immunize Patient for Cholera - No Doses

description: Provide Cholera immunizations – using the "WC vaccines (Shanchol, Euvchol, and mORCVAX) immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Cholera vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with a WC vaccines (Shanchol, Euvchol, and mORCVAX)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Years" >= 1text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with a WC vaccines (Shanchol, Euvchol, and mORCVAX)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Region recommends Cholera vaccination" = TRUEtext/cqlShould vaccinate patient with a WC vaccines (Shanchol, Euvchol, and mORCVAX)

definition: IMMZ.DT.15.Cholera.01

action

title: Immunize Patient for Cholera - 1 Dose

condition

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last Cholera dose given" >= "2 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with a WC vaccines (Shanchol, Euvchol, and mORCVAX)

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Type of last Cholera dose" = "WC vaccines"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with a WC vaccines (Shanchol, Euvchol, and mORCVAX)

definition: IMMZ.DT.15.Cholera.02

action

title: Immunize Patient for Cholera - Last dose given 3 years ago

description: Provide Cholera revaccination – using the "WC vaccines (Shanchol, Euvchol, and mORCVAX) immunization – Revaccination every 3 years" schedule (2 dose scheme)

condition
